entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 7:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h except west 20 in a few localities early this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
